Equation.name: Height of Trajectory
Equation.LaTeX:
r_{y} = r_{y,0} + v_{y,0} t + \frac{a_{y} t^{2}}{2} \\
\left | \begin{matrix} \\ r_{y,0} & = & 0 \\ a_{y} & = & g \\ v_{t_{1/2}} & = & 0 \\ t_{1/2} & = & \frac{v_{0} \sin(\theta)}{g} \\ \\ \end{matrix}\right. \\ r_{y} = \frac{g \left(\frac{v_{0} \sin(\theta)}{g}\right)^{2}}{2} \\ r_{y} = \frac{v_{0}^{2} \sin^{2}(\theta)}{2g} \\
